metadata.title: CVE-2017-14260 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, the AP4_StssAtom class in Ap4StssAtom.cppcontains a Write Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possible toexploit this vulnerability and possibly execute arbitrary code by opening acrafted .MP4 file.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
